content:
Quarterback Baker Mayfield throws a pass at fall camp Aug PERIOD  PERIOD

With the season just over two weeks away several Sooners have sat out practice including quarterback Baker Mayfield PERIOD

Mayfield sat out Thursdays practice due to a sore arm according to a member of the OU Athletics Department PERIOD Defensive lineman Neville Gallimore also did not participate at practice due to being  defensive coordinator Mike Stoops said PERIOD

Along with Mayfield and Gallimore safety Robert Barnes and linebacker JonMichael Terry also sat out but both have missed several practices over the last week PERIOD

Despite no serious injuries Oklahoma has been experiencing one of the longest fall camps in history with the end of twoadays PERIOD Due to the longer camp the team took a day off the football field and hit the driving range at Top Golf PERIOD

 safety Will Johnson said PERIOD 

Stoops thought the timing was great for the players and he believes he had the best swing PERIOD

 Stoops said PERIOD
